options.description: INT divide quality/alignment score by this factor [1]
consecutive alignments with the same name (and end for multi-ends) should be treated as multi-mapped reads [False]
INT number of raw input paired-end reads (otherwise, inferred from all SAM records present) [0]
INT consider only alignments with this mapping quality or greater [0]
input contains only single end reads [False]
INT consider only alignments with the number of specified SNPs [-1]
INT consider only alignments with the number of specified errors [-1]
STRING a read prefix that was prepended to each read name [not using]
